about_the_game:
Lamphlin and Feltin have lived quietly on their mountain for years since the emergence of The Demon Tree. The ground is getting dry, and they are forced to leave their peaceful home to seek safety elsewhere at the end of the world.

Journey through the stages of grief and loss as our heroes travel to bizarre areas, learning the stories of the planet’s last survivors. Encounter strange monsters, disturbing landscapes, and tales that make us reflect on our own experiences with grief.

Written by a hospice nurse with over ten years of experience, this game deeply reviews how people can respond to devastating events. We don’t always “get better” after we experience loss. Unresolved grief can be what takes us in the end.


KEY FEATURES

-Over 120 unique monsters to battle.

-Hand drawn cinematic cutscenes.

-Accordion-driven soundtrack.

-Over 10 hidden areas in game.

-“Ultimate spell” reward for players that love to grind up levels when they play RPGs.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of mental health crises, mutilation, substance abuse, and suicide, and may not be suitable for all audiences. It also contains bright flashing imagery that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.
